title: Pado's robes

properties.name: description
properties.value: Pado's robes were a proposed armour set, proposed alongside the Warding skill. They were a set of degradable mage robes that would have required level 30 Magic, Defence, and Prayer to wear. In order to ward the robes, players had to learn to do so via Brother Jered in the Edgeville Monastery, this would require level 30 Warding, along with holy silk and silver bars.

content:
This article contains information on content that did not pass a poll.
As such, the information presented here does not pertain to the live game, and is preserved for archival.

Pado's robes were a proposed armour set, proposed alongside the Warding skill. They were a set of degradable mage robes that would have required level 30 Magic, Defence, and Prayer to wear. In order to ward the robes, players had to learn to do so via Brother Jered in the Edgeville Monastery, this would require level 30 Warding, along with holy silk and silver bars.

The set had the following passive effects when all pieces are worn.

  • The total prayer bonus increases from +8 to +20.
  • Will of Saradomin - 10% increased damage against the following Zamorakian followers: Chaos druid, Elder Chaos druid, Monk of Zamorak, Lesser demon, Greater demon, Black demon, Vampyre, Werewolf, Chaos dwarf, Dark wizard, Solus Dellagar, Dessous, Damis, Fareed, Kamil, K'ril Tsutsaroth, Balfrug Kreeyath, Tstanon Karlak, Zakl'n Gritch
  • Players cannot cast Flames of Zamorak whilst wearing the robes.
Item Attack Bonuses Defence Bonuses Other
Pado's helm 0 0 0 +3 0 +11 +11 +11 +5 0 0 0 0% +2
Pado's robe top 0 0 0 +15 0 0 0 0 +10 0 0 0 0% +2
Pado's robe bottoms 0 0 0 +10 0 0 0 0 +7 0 0 0 0% +2
Pado's cloak 0 0 0 +2 0 0 0 0 +3 0 0 0 0% +2
Totals 0 0 0 +30 0 +11 +11 +11 +25 0 0 0 0% +8

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When initially proposed, the set was non-degradable and included boots instead of a cloak. Originally the Will of Saradomin passive effect was a 25% damage increase, and the prayer bonus when the full set was equipped was +35, these were lowered in a revision three days later.
